The video was originally published on Fa: 2019, and has been viewed more than 800 times since.
The video: s caption mentions that a crocodile came out of the Ganga river in Rajendra Nagar, Patna, which is a residential locality situated on the bank of the Ganges in Patna, Bihar.
Multiple Facebook: Twitter, and YouTube posts have shared the video with similar claims, indicating its widespread circulation.
A journalist from AFP: s Delhi bureau analyzed the video and found that people in the video can be heard speaking in the regional Gujarati language, suggesting that the incident took place in Vadodara, Gujarat, and not in Patna, Bihar.
